TopicTitle: Am I allowed to post "Lol, dead chat?"

Articles.Content:
The rules are here: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/guidelines/

2.2.m. forbids:

Quote

Any variation on the type of message that is used to needlessly bump threads, raise ones own account visibility and/or increase post count;

Since I'm not a moderator, I can only speak for myself, but personally if I saw such a post, I would probably report it in the hopes of having it deleted before it wasted anyone else's time.
We ask that our forum members have something substantial to say when posting.
